vogar.target

Interface Runner

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CaliperRunner, JUnitRunner, MainRunner

    public interface Runner
    Interface between the generic TestRunner and the more specific backend implementations that know about specific types of tests.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void init(TargetMonitor monitor, java.lang.String actionName, java.lang.String qualification, java.lang.Class<?> klass, java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicReference<java.lang.String> skipPastReference, TestEnvironment testEnvironment, int timeoutSeconds, boolean profile) 
      boolean run(java.lang.String actionName, Profiler profiler, java.lang.String[] args) 
      boolean supports(java.lang.Class<?> klass)
      Returns true if this runner can exercise klass.

      • run

        boolean run(java.lang.String actionName,
          Profiler profiler,
          java.lang.String[] args)
        Returns:
        true if this run completed normally. Otherwise the calling process should kill this process and attempt to resume after the last known outcome.
